hero.subtitle: SOLxAR is where the paths of {word} cross

resourcesPage.title: Resources
resourcesPage.subtitle: Explore our collection of resources to learn, develop, and connect with the Solana ecosystem. From technical documentation to tutorials and tools, here you'll find everything you need to start your journey in Solana.
resourcesPage.ctaSubtitle: If you know of any resource that could be useful for the SOLxAR community, share it with us and help others learn and grow in the Solana ecosystem.

solanaDocs.description: Official guides and documentation for developers.

cookbook.description: Recipes and examples for building on Solana.

web3js.description: JavaScript library for interacting with Solana.

university.description: Educational resources to learn about Solana.

daily.title: Solana Daily
daily.description: Daily news about the Solana ecosystem.

about.title: What is SOLxAR?
about.subtitle: SOLxAR is Solana's innovation hub in Argentina, created to connect, boost, and strengthen the region's blockchain ecosystem. A space to collaborate, learn, and build the future of Web3.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Over 500 builders, devs, and creators working together.

projects.title: Innovative Projects
projects.description: We drive projects that are defining the future of Web3.

reach.title: Regional Reach
reach.description: We connect talent and opportunities across Latin America.

impact.title: Real Impact
impact.description: We generate real growth and professional development.

missionSection.title: Our Mission
missionSection.subtitle: Building the future of Web3 in Latin America, one connection at a time.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Accelerate Solana adoption in Latin America by connecting builders with resources, opportunities and a vibrant community.

values.title: Values
values.description: Transparency, collaboration, innovation and inclusion are the pillars that guide each of our actions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be the most influential Web3 innovation ecosystem in Latin America, driving the decentralized future.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build a diverse and inclusive network where every builder can find their place and grow their ideas.

why.title: Why SOLxAR?
why.description: At SOLxAR we believe that Latin America has unique potential to lead the next wave of blockchain innovation. Our region combines exceptional talent, limitless creativity and a real need for decentralized financial solutions. We are here to connect these elements and create a thriving ecosystem where ideas become reality.

eventsSection.title: Upcoming Events
eventsSection.subtitle: Join our events and connect with the Solana community in Buenos Aires.
eventsSection.errorMessage: We are experiencing technical issues with our calendar. Please visit our Luma page directly.

hackathonSection.prize: Collaborate to grow this prize pool!
hackathonSection.organizeDescription: If you represent a company or institution and are interested in organizing a hackathon with SOLxAR, contact us to discuss collaboration possibilities.

communitySection.title: Our Community
communitySection.stayUpdated: Stay up to date with the latest news, events, and opportunities in the Solana ecosystem in Argentina.

membersSection.title: Our Community
membersSection.subtitle: Meet the builders who are building the future of Web3 in LATAM.

membersSection.joinSubtitle: Join our community of builders and be part of the future of Web3 in LATAM.

partnershipsSection.becomeSponsor: Want to become a SOLxAR sponsor?

projectsSection.title: What Are Our Builders Shipping?
projectsSection.subtitle: Discover the most innovative projects from our community.

oro.title: ORO
oro.description: Gold-backed stablecoin with 1:1 physical backing and annual yield.

continent.title: Continent
continent.description: A dapp designed for crypto-native communities to connect IRL.

mana.title: Mana
mana.description: AI tool for Web3 that analyzes behaviors and creates scoring for communities.

partnerships.sectionSubtitle: Partner with SOLxAR to accelerate Solana's adoption in Argentina and Latin America. We offer bespoke collaboration opportunities designed to align with your unique goals and vision, ensuring a personalized and impactful approach. Together, we can build a vibrant, innovative ecosystem that drives meaningful growth for Solana in the region.
partnerships.ctaSubtitle: Contact us to discuss how we can work together to boost the Solana ecosystem in Argentina and Latin America.

companies.title: Companies
companies.description: Integrate Solana into your products or services. We offer technical support, ecosystem connections, and visibility at our events.

institutions.title: Educational Institutions
institutions.description: We collaborate with universities and educational centers to introduce blockchain and Solana in academic programs.

communities.title: Communities
communities.description: We connect with other tech communities to create synergies and amplify the impact of our initiatives.

communitySponsorship.title: Community Sponsorship
communitySponsorship.description: Support the SOLxAR community and connect with Solana enthusiasts in Argentina.

eventSponsorship.title: Event Sponsorship
eventSponsorship.description: Sponsor meetups, hackathons, and conferences to connect with the Solana community in Argentina.

b2b.title: Regional Expansion - B2B Collaborations
b2b.description: Use our network to expand your presence in the Latin American market.

devPrograms.title: Development Programs
devPrograms.description: Provide tools and resources for developers in blockchain and Solana technologies.

footer.description: Solana's leading innovation network in Latin America. Connecting builders with opportunities and resources.
